mapper.select: SELECT cod_esta,cod_cen as descripcion, establecimiento as consultorio,0 as id_consultorio FROM establecimientos Where cod_cen!='' order by cod_cen
SELECT 0 as cod_esta,cod_serv as descripcion, descrip_serv as consultorio,id_especialidad as id_consultorio FROM servicio order by descrip_serv
SELECT 0 as cod_esta,cod_serv as descripcion, descrip_serv as consultorio,id_especialidad as id_consultorio FROM servicio order by descrip_serv
SELECT 0 as cod_esta,cod_serv as descripcion, descrip_serv as consultorio,id_especialidad as id_consultorio FROM servicio WHERE cod_serv=#{cargo} order by descrip_serv
SELECT 0 as cod_esta,cod_serv as descripcion, descrip_serv as consultorio,id_especialidad as id_consultorio FROM servicio WHERE id_especialidad=#{id_consultorio} order by descrip_serv limit 1
SELECT be_codigo as descripcion, be_descri as consultorio FROM public.tipo_ben;

SELECT id_consultorio, consultorio,id_espe_cns as descripcion,id_estado,id_cargo,id_especialidad FROM consultorios WHERE id_estado='A' and (id_especialidad!=98 and id_especialidad!=99) and id_consultorio!=0 and id_consultorio!=7 and id_consultorio!=14 and id_consultorio in (select id_consultorio from personas where cod_esta=#{cod_esta} and urgencias=#{id_especialidad} group by id_consultorio) ORDER BY consultorio

SELECT id_consultorio, consultorio,id_espe_cns as descripcion,id_estado,id_cargo,id_especialidad FROM consultorios WHERE id_estado='A' and selec=#{selec} and id_consultorio!=0 and id_consultorio!=1 ORDER BY consultorio;

SELECT id_consultorio, consultorio,id_espe_cns as descripcion,id_estado,id_cargo,id_especialidad FROM consultorios WHERE id_estado='A' and id_cargo>0 and id_consultorio!=0 and id_consultorio!=7 and id_consultorio in (select id_consultorio from personas where cod_esta=#{cod_esta}) ORDER BY consultorio;

SELECT id_consultorio, consultorio,id_espe_cns as descripcion,id_estado,id_cargo,id_especialidad FROM consultorios WHERE id_estado='A' and id_cargo>0 and id_consultorio!=0 and id_consultorio!=7 and id_consultorio in (select id_consultorio from personas where id_persona in (select id_persona from public.fichas_inter where cod_esta=#{cod_esta} ) ) ORDER BY consultorio;

SELECT id_consultorio, consultorio,id_espe_cns as descripcion,id_estado,id_cargo,id_especialidad FROM consultorios WHERE id_estado='A' and id_consultorio!=0 and id_consultorio!=1 ORDER BY consultorio;

SELECT id_consultorio, consultorio,id_espe_cns as descripcion,id_estado,id_cargo,id_especialidad FROM consultorios WHERE id_estado='A' and id_consultorio!=0 and id_consultorio!=1 and id_especialidad!=99 and (id_cargo between 1 and 99) and id_especialidad>0 ORDER BY consultorio;
mapper.insert: insert into consultorios (consultorio, descripcion, id_estado,ult_usuario,id_cargo) values ( #{consultorio}, #{descripcion}, 'A', #{ult_usuario}, #{id_cargo})
mapper.select: SELECT id_cargo, cargo, descripcion,id_estado FROM cargos WHERE id_estado='A' ORDER BY cargo;
mapper.insert: insert into cargos (cargo, descripcion, id_estado) values ( #{cargo}, #{descripcion}, 'A' )
mapper.update: update cargos set cargo = #{cargo}, descripcion = #{descripcion}, id_estado = #{id_estado} where id_cargo = #{id_cargo}
